attributes.action: Simply create a proper and fitting government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the British people, demand  much more suitable government. Less beaurocracy, more implementation; Less chasing targets, more chasing criminals; Less surveillance, more detection; Less taxes, more USE of taxpayers money....put simply, less control or 'nannying', more sensible government!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
